mapper.sql: id, create_date, update_date, data_status, desp, status, costs, order_id, transporter_id, company_id
mapper.select: select a.id, a.create_date as createDate, a.update_date as updateDate, a.data_status as dataStatus, a.desp as desp, a.status, a.costs, d.order_no as orderNo, b.surname,b.name, c.name as companyName from t_order_apply a left join t_user b on a.transporter_id = b.id left join t_company c on a.company_id = c.id left join t_order d on a.order_id = d.id
mapper.insert: insert into t_order_apply (id, create_date, update_date, data_status, desp, status, costs, order_id, transporter_id, company_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dataStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{desp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{costs,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transporterId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into t_order_apply
id,
create_date,
update_date,
data_status,
desp,
status,
costs,
order_id,
transporter_id,
company_id,

mapper.update:
update t_order_apply
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
data_status = #{dataStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
desp = #{desp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
costs = #{costs,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
transporter_id = #{transporterId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_order_apply set create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, data_status = #{dataStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, desp = #{desp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, costs = #{costs,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transporter_id = #{transporterId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
